Package com.dryver.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityDryverMain
    This activities deals with providing the driver with UI for requests.
    ActivityDryverMap
    Map activity for the driver.
    ActivityDryverSelection
    Activity that displays all of the data relevant to the request a driver has selected
    ActivityEditProfile
    This activity is for displaying the active user's information as well as allowing them to edit it and save it.
    ActivityLoggedInActionBar
    Inflates a consistent action bar in activities for viewing the user's profile and logging out
    ActivityOpeningPage
    This activity is the point for application and lets the user login or register.
    ActivityRegistration
    User registration screen.
    ActivityRequest
    Activity used to get information from the user for a request they are about to make.
    ActivityRequestDriverList
    Activity for the rider to view all drivers that's associated with a particular request
    ActivityRequestMap
    Activity provides a user an interface for selecting the to and from destination on a map.
    ActivityRydeOrDryve
    Activity provides the user with a choice to choose if he'd like to be a rider or a driver.
    ActivityRyderMain
    The activity that acts as the main rider activity.
    ActivityRyderSelection
    The activity responsible for viewing a requests details more closely / inspecting a request.
    ActivityViewProfile
    This activity is responsible for handling the viewing of a profile that is not the active user's Email and phone is done from here
